snippet: This comedy, directed by Kevin Pollak, searches somewhat desperately for laughs in the premise of 30-year-olds acting like frat boys....
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie The Late Bloomer, directed by Kevin Pollak and starring Johnny Simmons.
lead_paragraph: This comedy, directed by Kevin Pollak, searches somewhat desperately for laughs in the premise of 30-year-olds acting like frat boys.

headline.main: Review: ‘The Late Bloomer,’ About a Sex Therapist Who Missed Puberty
